title: Streaming service subscribers in India 2017
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and a y axis representing Number of subscribers in millions.
The highest category is found at Hotstar where Number of subscribers in millions is 63.0.
The lowest category is found at Ozee_TV where Number of subscribers in millions is 2.4.
gold: The graph shows the number of subscribers to selected video streaming services in India as of January 2017 . According to the source , Netflix had 4.2 million subscribers in India as of January 2017 .
